Package com.example.eventscan.Fragments

Class ProfileFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.eventscan.Fragments.ProfileFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class ProfileFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
A simple fragment subclass for managing user profiles. Allows us to view our or another users profile, as well as edit some fields if desired.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    • onCreate

      public void onCreate(@Nullable android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

    • onCreateView

      public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, android.view.ViewGroup container, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Inflates the layout for this fragment and initializes UI components. Loads user profile information from Firestore and sets listeners for button clicks.
      Overrides:
      onCreateView in class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    • saveAttendeeProfile

      private void saveAttendeeProfile(Attendee attendee)
      Saves the attendee's profile information to Firestore. If a profile picture is selected, uploads it to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      attendee - The Attendee object containing profile information.

    • isProfilePictureUploaded

      private boolean isProfilePictureUploaded()
      Checks if a profile picture is uploaded.
      Returns:
      True if a profile picture is uploaded, false otherwise.

    • deleteProfilePicture

      private void deleteProfilePicture()
      Deletes the profile picture from Firebase Storage and updates the UI.

      private void loadProfileInfo()
      Loads the user's profile information from Firestore and updates the UI.

      Parameters:
      attendee - The Attendee object containing the profile information to display.
